statements: SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT battery_capacity, charge_level FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE battery_health > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM electric_vehicle_battery ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(battery_health) AS average_health FROM electric_vehicle_battery;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE battery_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_battery ORDER BY battery_health DESC, last_maintenance_date ASC, vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, charge_level FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE battery_health > 0.8 AND charge_level < 0.5 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC
SELECT AVG(battery_capacity) AS avg_battery_capacity, MAX(battery_health) AS max_battery_health FROM electric_vehicle_battery
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, charge_level, last_maintenance_date FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_health, charge_level FROM electric_vehicle_battery WHERE battery_health BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 ORDER BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM battery_data WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT vehicle_id, health_status FROM battery_data WHERE battery_charge > 50;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE battery_capacity > 70;
SELECT vehicle_id, health_status, last_check FROM battery_data WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND health_status = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY year DESC, manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM battery_data WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 ORDER BY last_check DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_charge, health_status FROM battery_data WHERE health_status LIKE 'Good%' AND battery_charge > 80;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE battery_capacity >= 50.0 AND battery_type = 'Lithium Ion' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_charge FROM battery_data WHERE vehicle_id IN (54321, 67890) AND battery_charge BETWEEN 20 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM battery_data bd JOIN vehicle_info vi ON bd.vehicle_id = vi.vehicle_id WHERE bd.battery_charge < vi.battery_capacity AND vi.year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM VehicleDetails ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT make, MAX(max_speed) FROM VehicleDetails GROUP BY make HAVING MAX(max_speed) > 150;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_percentage, estimated_range FROM BatteryLife WHERE battery_percentage <= 50 ORDER BY last_charge_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_health_status, maintenance_needed FROM BatteryHealth WHERE maintenance_needed = TRUE;
SELECT make, model, year, max_speed FROM VehicleDetails WHERE year >= 2020 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_percentage, estimated_range, last_charge_date FROM BatteryLife WHERE battery_percentage > 50 ORDER BY battery_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryHealth WHERE maintenance_needed = TRUE ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, max_speed FROM VehicleDetails WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year >= 2018 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_health_status, maintenance_needed FROM BatteryHealth ORDER BY maintenance_needed ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_percentage, estimated_range, last_charge_date FROM BatteryLife WHERE estimated_range < 200 ORDER BY estimated_range DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, year FROM vehicle_details ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM vehicle_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT vehicle_id, charging_date, charging_energy FROM charging_history WHERE charging_energy > 50 ORDER BY charging_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_percentage, charging_status FROM battery_info WHERE charging_status = 'charging';
SELECT * FROM battery_info WHERE battery_percentage > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, manufacturer FROM vehicle_details ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, health_status FROM battery_health WHERE battery_temperature < 30 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT charger_id, charging_date, charging_duration FROM charging_history WHERE charging_energy < 50 ORDER BY charging_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_info WHERE last_charge_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info
SELECT battery_id, vehicle_id, health_status FROM battery_health
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, warranty_start_date FROM vehicle_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla'
SELECT * FROM charging_history ORDER BY charging_start_time DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, planned_date, completed FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed = FALSE
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, battery_capacity FROM vehicle_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT vehicle_id, warranty_start_date FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, health_status, last_checkup_date FROM battery_health WHERE health_status = 'Good' ORDER BY last_checkup_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE charge_energy > 50 ORDER BY charging_duration DESC;
